name: Perfect Ace 2: The Championships
synopsis: Perfect Ace 2 takes you on a complete World tour for singles, Doubles and mixed Doubles as well as the option of a quick match anywhere in the world, incl. multi-player options for up to 4 players. Featuring new stadiums, new player models, full player editor, new game mechanics and new animations, Perfect Ace 2: The Championships offers the finest tennis simulation yet.
